p: Chronic kidney disease (CKD [>=]3), Previous myocardial infarction, Abnormal ECG at presentation, Congestive cardiac failure, Chronic pulmonary disease, Cerebrovascular disease, Dementia/cognitive impairment, Long term institutionalised mental health, Chronic liver disease, Solid tumours, Hospital stay >5days before critical care review, Previous hospitalisation in past year, Previous ICU admissions, Marked weight loss in last 12 months and Frailty (Rockwood scale [>=]4) 2.
